title: 4K resolution
summary: 4K resolution refers to a horizontal display resolution of approximately 4,000 pixels.[1]  Digital television and digital cinematography commonly use several different 4K resolutions. In television and consumer media, 3840 × 2160 (4K UHD) is the dominant 4K standard, whereas the movie projection industry uses 4096 × 2160 (DCI 4K).
